meanings.definition: Bring (goods or services) into a country from abroad for sale.
meanings.sent1: The store reimported new toys from China to sell.
meanings.sent2: She reimported the rare spices from India to sell in her shop.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper reimported the unique candies to offer a taste of foreign sweets.
meanings.sent4: He reimported the latest technology to stay ahead in the market.
meanings.sent5: The company reimported fresh fruits to provide exotic options for customers.

meanings.definition: Bring (goods or services) back into a country after they have been exported.
meanings.sent1: The company reimported the machinery from overseas for maintenance.
meanings.sent2: They reimported the vintage cars after showcasing them at the international exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The farmer reimported the seeds to grow the same crop again.
meanings.sent4: She reimported the handmade crafts to display at the local fair.
meanings.sent5: The museum reimported the ancient artifacts for a special exhibit.
